boardgame.name: Pixel Tactics
Waleczne Piksele
Пиксель Тактикс
boardgame.description: Pixel Tactics is a head-to-head game of tactical combat for two players. Each player has an identical deck of 25 cards, from which they draft a leader. The leader's abilities alter vastly the strategy and playability of every other card in the deck, making the game playable in 25 different ways._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the game, players take turns placing cards and attacking. Each card can activate in various ways, taking on offensive capabilities in the front rows of the unit, or support powers in the back rows. Cards can also be played as orders _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; powerful single-time effects that can turn the tide of battle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Play continues until either player's leader is defeated. A typical game is best of three or five rounds._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Pixel Tactics takes place in the same world and uses many of the characters from Level 99 Games' BattleCON: War of Indines, but its game play is entirely unrelated._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Level 99 Games (L99PT001) Pixel Tactics is a head-to-head card game for two players that recreates the feel of a Strategy Roleplaying Game (SPRG). Experienced eBay seller, new to BGG selling. Love games. Shipping: (Standard or Registered Post) Standard Post (Including 1.35 Euro packaging materials in price) Ireland - 4.90 UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe - 6.35 USA, Canada, Japan, New Zealand, Australia - 6.35 Registered Post: (Including 1.35 Euro packaging materials in price) Ireland - 8.10 UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe - 11.40 USA, Canada, Japan, New Zealand, Australia - 11.40 Registered post everywhere else. Payment (In order of preference) 1) Bank Transfer - BIC/IBAN (Ireland, UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe only) - Buyer pays transfer fees if any. (Free cross border BIC/IBAN bank transfers within EU countries as far as I know.) 2) PayPal - Select _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Send money to friends and family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; option to bypass paying fees altogether, no PayPal buyer protection by doing this but you won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need it. (It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s always free to send money to friends and family when you use your PayPal Balance or Bank Account) If you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t do this for whatever reason then please add 5 percent of the total cost (Item + P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P) to cover fees. Or buyer pays fees as part of the normal PayPal process when paying for merchandise or services if you really want the payment protection. All my games are exactly as described and are usually posted next working day after payment is received. Any other issues will be swiftly resolved in a professional and courteous manner. 3) As a last resort, I also accept Skrill, Payza and Neteller (In that order and buyer pays fees). Combined postage for multiple items where possible. Combined P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P can result in higher shipping costs than for a single item due to different postage weight brackets but 9 times out of 10 it should still be less than shipping the items separately. On some occasions, depending on the items, only slightly less. If the combined items weight is less than 2 Kilo, item(s) will most likely be sent in the Packet weight bracket. If items can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be split into smaller packets then anything over 2 Kilos is a Registered Parcel and the P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P costs are considerably higher, usually starting between €40 and €45 and increasing in price as the weight increases for various destinations outside Ireland. PM me for further details if required. All my games for sale come from a smoke and pet free environment. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Best of luck and enjoy if you buy. Pixel Tactics 2 https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/product/970790 Pixel Tactics 3 https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/product/970792
